ForecastingFilter.name: ForecastingFilter
ForecastingFilter.description: Represents the custom filter for including or excluding data from opportunity forecasts.

DeveloperName.description: The developer name of the forecast filter.

FilterLogic.description: The logic that controls the evaluation of conditions. Only AND is supported. For example, 1 AND 2 AND 3.

ForecastingTypeId.description: The ID of the forecast type. Can be linked only to forecast types created in Summer ’21 and later.

ForecastingTypeSourceId.description: The ID of the forecast type source. Can be linked only to forecast type sources created in Summer ’21 or later and with a forecast source definition with source object of 'Opportunity’.

FullName.description: The full name of the forecast filter.

Language.description: The language of the forecast filter.

MasterLabel.description: The label for this object, which displays in Setup. The label is in the default language locale for the organization. If there’s no default language locale, the label is in en_US.

Metadata.description: The metadata of the forecast filter.

ForecastingFilter.accessRules: As of Spring ’20 and later, only standard users with the View All Forecasts permission OR Allow Forecasting permission OR delegated forecast manager status can access this object.
